sentences.en: Dream nosegay , mean to have to get, the ability on good terms luck.
sentences.cn: 梦见花束, 意味着有所获, 能交好运.

sentences.en: Easter is also a festival that we could send flowers corsages and so on. Many persons go to churches dedicate up the nosegay .
sentences.cn: 复活节也是向你所关怀的人关鲜花，盆景，胸花等地节日。许多去做礼拜的人这天也向教堂献上花束。

sentences.en: Every tree, every hedge is a nosegay.
sentences.cn: 每一棵树, 每一片篱笆,是一束芬芳的花朵.

sentences.en: The candlestick was in the form of an angel holding a nosegay, in the centre of which the wax taper was to be placed.
sentences.cn: 它的形状是一个抱着花束的安琪儿；而蜡烛就插在这个花束的中央。 这烛台在一张绿色的写字台上佔了一个地位。

trans.tran_cn: <文>（手拿或戴在衣服上的）小花束，（尤指有香味的）花束
